verses.1: Pasian aw, hong hon in! Bang hang hiam cih leh tuikhang in ka ngawng ciang hong tuum ta hi.
verses.2: Khe tawh din kipna ding mun a om lohna buannawng thuk sungah ka tum suk a, tui thuk sung tung khinta-in ka tungah tuikhang a luang hi.
verses.3: Ka kikokona-in ka gim a, ka dang keu ta hi. Ka Pasian ka ngakngakna-in ka mitte maang ta hi.
verses.4: Thu om lopi-in kei a hong mudah mi, ka lu tunga samzangte sangin tam zaw uh hi. Kei a hong susia ding, zuau thu tawh a hong dote hat mahmah uh hi. Keiʼ guk lohpi keʼn loh ding ka hi hiam?
verses.5: Pasian aw, ka pil lohna na thei a, ka tatkhialhnate nangma kiang pan kiliah lo hi.
verses.6: Vanglian Topa Pasian aw, nangmah a hong muangte keima hangin zahhuaisak kei in. Israel Pasian aw, nang a hong zongte keima hangin mindaisak kei in.
verses.7: Bang hang hiam cih leh nangma hangin kona ka thuak a, maizumna in kei hong pumtuam khinta hi.
verses.8: Ka sanggamte lakah midangpi ka suak a, khualmi ka bang hi.
verses.9: Nangma inn ka deih luatna mei bangin ka sungah sa a, nangmah hong koteʼ konate keima tung hong tu hi.
verses.10: An ngolhna tawh ka lungsim ka kiniamkhiat a, tua pen keimah hong kikona leh suak zawsop hi.
verses.11: Ka puan dingin puanhampi bawl taleng zong amaute adingin gentehna ka suak veve hi.
verses.12: Kongzing lakah miteʼ gengen ka hi a, zukhamte in keima thu la-in hong sa uh hi.
verses.13: Topa aw, keʼn ahihleh nang tungah thu kong ngen hi. A kicing na itna kip tawh a hunhoih ciangin hong dawng in, ka Pasian aw.
verses.14: Buannawng thuk sungah tum sukna ding panin nangma thuman huhna tawh kei hong hon inla, tui thukte le ka galteʼ kiang panin kei hong suaktasak in.
verses.15: Keima tungah tuikhang lauhuai hong luangsak kei inla, khuamial thukpi hong nawmvalhsak kei in. Gum in a kuavang keima tungah hong khak nelhsak kei in.
verses.16: Topa aw, na itna kip hoih ahih manin kei hong dawng inla, na hehpihna lian a om tawh kizui-in keiʼ lam hong nga in.
verses.17: Na nasem pa kiang pan na maitang seel kei inla, kei cimawh ka hih ciangin hong dawng meng in.
verses.18: Kei kiangah hong nai inla, kei hong hon in. Ka galteʼ khut sung pan kei hong khah in!
verses.19: Keimah hong kisimmawhna, ka maizumna le ka mindaina nang na thei a, ka galte khempeuh zong nang na thei hi.
verses.20: Simmawhna in ka lungsim hong zo a, kei ka cimawh ta hi. Kei a hong hehpih ding mi ka zonzon hangin kuamah om lo a, hong huh ding ka zon hangin kuamah ka mu kei hi.
verses.21: Amaute in an dingin gu hong pia uh a, ka dangtakna ah dawn dingin tui thuk hong pia uh hi.
verses.22: Amauʼ mai-a kilui ante thangzak suaksak inla, amauʼ biakna pawi ante tehlop suaksak in.
verses.23: Khua a muh theih loh nadingun amauʼ mit mialsak inla, a kawngte uh zawcipsak in.
verses.24: Amaute tungah nangma thangpaihna sung suk inla, na sinsona amaute bansak in.
verses.25: Amauteʼ phualpi a kilawi mun suak henla, amauʼ buk ah mi khat zong tengsak kei in.
verses.26: Bang hang hiam cih leh nangmah in na sat gawp mi amaute in bawlsia uh a, nangmah in na liamsak sa mi amaute in gimsak sawnsawn uh hi.
verses.27: Amauʼ gim thuakna banah thuaksak thuahthuah lai inla, nangma tung panin suahtakna ngah kei ta uh hen.
verses.28: A nungtateʼ laibu sung panin amaute kiphiatsak inla, miphate lakah a min uh kikhumsak kei in.
verses.29: Ahih hangin keimah in gimna thuakin na ka sa hi. Pasian aw, kei hong kai to-in hong hon khia ta in.
verses.30: Lasakna tawh Pasianʼ min ka phat dinga, lungdamna tawh amah ka pahtawi ding hi.
verses.31: Hih banga hihna in bawngtal tawh biakna ahi a, bawngtalno tawh biakna sangin zong Topa lungdamsak zaw ding hi.
verses.32: Netniamna a thuakte in hih thu mu-in lungdam uh hen. Pasian a zong note aw, na lungsim uh nosuaksakkik un.
verses.33: Bang hang hiam cih leh Topa in a cimawhteʼ aw za a, henna sungah a om a mite simmawh lo hi.
verses.34: Vantung le leitung, tuipi le a sungah a om khempeuhte in amah phat ta uh hen.
verses.35: Bang hang hiam cih leh Pasian in Zion honin Judah khuapite lamkik dinga, a nasemte tua lai ah teengin tang pah ding uh hi.
verses.36: Ama nasemteʼ tate in tua leitang luah ding uh a, amah a itte tua sungah teeng ding uh hi.
